Class TranslateService

java.lang.Object
metroMalaga.Controller.TranslateService
public class TranslateService extends Object
Service class for handling application localization and translations.

  • Constructor Details

    • TranslateService

      public TranslateService()
      Constructor for TranslateService. Initialize with Spanish.

  • Method Details

    • loadTranslations

      public void loadTranslations(String languageColumn)
      Loads translations from the database for the specified language.
      Parameters:
      languageColumn - The database column name for the language (e.g., "espanol", "ingles").

    • get

      public String get(int id)
      Retrieves a translated string by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the translation string.
      Returns:
      The translated string, or a placeholder if not found.

    • setLanguage

      public void setLanguage(String languageColumn)
      Sets the current language and reloads translations.
      Parameters:
      languageColumn - The language column name.

    • getCurrentLanguage

      public String getCurrentLanguage()
      Gets the currently active language.
      Returns:
      The language code/column name.

    • setSpanish

      public void setSpanish()
      switch language to Spanish.

    • setEnglish

      public void setEnglish()
      Switch language to English.
